Erroneous bytes are replaced with the + * supplied {@code Charset}'s {@linkplain java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder##cae + * replacement value}. @@ -156,3 +159,0 @@ - * @implNote This implementation will throw an {@link java.lang.IllegalArgumentException} - * when illegal strings are encountered. - * @@ -163,2 +163,2 @@ - * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation encounters illegal - * characters + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the implementation encounters malformed + * escape sequences

@@ -207,0 +207,3 @@ + *

+ * If a character needs encoding but cannot be encoded, the + * {@linkplain CharsetEncoder##cae replacement bytes} will be used.
